name: jsynk
description: jSynk.js is a small javascript framework the browser/node.js with functions to convert javascript objects to publish/subscribe changes, to html, to css, html to dom, string including functions and regex, testing, benchmarking, modular loader, animating, diffing, async parallel helper functions and other utilities.
